Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of a Scribe of God's Offerings of All the Gods named Bakenkhons, with a black lappet wig, a brown face, the front of the body down to the crossed arms is yellow, the collar is blue, the brown hands are depicted holding two red hoes, the legs are inscribed with a central column of black hieroglyphs on yellow ground, the edges of the legs and the back are painted white overlain with a representation of a red seed-basket and a red yoke with two nu-pots on the back of either arm.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir John Gardner Wilkinson
